home.description_line3: ¿Kusirichiyta wasikunata munanqui? Banderata tarispa may yachasqaypiky yanapay, kay aplicacionta usaspa.
home.how_work_description: Banderata mapapi qawaspa tarisun kinkinchik o yanapakuy munaqkuna kay wasikuna yanapanapaq.
home.community_description: Necsitaq wasikunata yanapaspaikiqa, fotota apachumy wakin yanapakuq munaqkuna kaqllata ruananpaq.
home.comment_flag_description: Banderamanta rimaspaiky pim kay ruaqman rimanakuy.
home.raise_flag_description: Yanapanaykuta munaspa o yanapana wasita tarispa, banderata qatarichiy y wakinkunaman riqsichiy runamasin yanapananpaq.
home.register_flag_description: Yanapanata munaspa o qawanki yanapana wasikunata, banderata churay mapapi runamasinchik tarinanpaq.
home.register_flag_step2: Yanapana wasita mapapi tarispa maypin kasqanta churay.
home.register_flag_step3: Señalta qina qellqaspaiki churay yanapakuqkuna necesitasqaykita yachananpaq.
home.about_subtitle: Yuaq bandera qatarichiy mana imallayku llamkaq.
home.about_description: Runamasikim kaniku qamqina kay pandemia COVID 19 afectasqa imaynan kay pandemia afectawachkanchik lliu runamainchikunata. Quñunakuniku yanapayta munaspa kay herramientawan yanapana wasikunata tarispa yanapakunapaq.
home.motivation_description: Redes sociales nisqampin qawaniku kay yuraq banderamanta. Redes sociales nisqanqa manan yanapawankuchu tarinaykupaq yanapana wasikunta , Kay Yuraq bandera APLICATIVO qina huk mapallapi qawasqalla kanqa yanapanapaq wasikuna.
